related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Nominal)    1.She .........my classmate *

A.was not

B.are not

C.is not

D.am not

2. ........... Brian our new neighbour? 

A.Is

B.Am

C.Was

D.Are

3. I ........ a teacher in SMAN-8

A.is

B.are

C.am

D.were

4. Arina and Firda............best dancers of this competition. 

A.are

B.is

C.was

D.am

5. ...................they the students of MTsN Barito Utara? 

A.Was

B.Am

C.Are

D.Is

6. Football ......... the most

favourite sport in earth. 

A.am

B.is

C.are

D.were

7. My brother and I......... actors for action movies. 

A.was

B.is

C.am

D.are

8............Mr. Bean so funny person ?

A.Is not

B.Are not

C.Am not

D.Were not​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.C she is not

2.A.Is

3.C.Am

4.A.Are

5.C.Are

6.B.is

7.D.Are

8.A.Is not

Penjelasan:

I/YOU/THEY/WE :PAKAI ARE

HE/SHE/IT:PAKAI IS

Kalau lebih dari satu orang seperti no.7 pakai ARE

jika yg di tanyakan nama orang pakai IS

Jawaban:

1. C

2. A

3. C

4. A

5. C

6. B

7. D

8. A

Subject. To be

I. Am

You, We, They. Are

He, She, It. Is

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu :D

related_questions.question:
Where is the living room?    a. on the first floor
b. on the basement
c. on the ground floor
d. on the second floor​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

" where is the living room? " ( dimana ruang tamu? )

C. on the ground floor ( dilantai dasar )

Penjelasan:

A. on the first floor ( salah ).

( dilantai pertama ) = bisa dinyatakan lantai pertama setelah lantai dasar

B. on the basement ( salah )

( di ruang bawah tanah ) = yg ditanyakan " dimana ruang tamu? " ruang tamu umumnya terdapat pada lantai dasar.

C. on the ground floor ( benar )

( dilantai dasar ) = ruang tamu terdapat pada lantai dasar.

D. on the second floor ( salah ).

( dilantai kedua ) = dilantai kedua biasanya terdapat kamar

= jadi jawabannya c. on the ground floor
